bibl.title: The Telephus of Euripides. (University of London, Institute of Classical Studies. Supplement. 5.)
bibl.note: Édition princeps de P. Oxy. XXVII, 2460 (= Pack2 448) et attribution de P. Berol. Inv. 9908 (= Pack2 449) au Télèphe d'Euripide. Essai de reconstruction de la pièce. - Appendix: les fragments grecs et latins.
Handley E.W. and John Rea, The Telephus of Euripides. (University of London, Institute of Classical Studies. Supplement. 5.)
